item.title: Missing paving slab outside of 43 Chessington Avenue which is a trip hazard, 16th September
item.description:
Missing paving slab outside of 43 Chessington Avenue which is a trip hazard, since being replaced the tarmac has sunk causing a trip hazard for the elderly and disabled residence and for those with a sight impairment. The tarmac breaks away every time it's driven over. Can this please be repaired with a paving slab as per original. This has previously been reported in Feb & recently in August under 3061991 but has not been resolved- please can this be actioned ASAP.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chessington Avenue, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet
